Class TetrisPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • TetrisPiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TetrisL1, TetrisL2, TetrisS1, TetrisS2, TetrisSquare, TetrisStick, TetrisT

    public abstract class TetrisPiece
extends java.lang.Object
    The TetrisPiece abstract class represents a piece made of 4 TetrisBlocks. It maintains 4 rotations (0 degrees, 90 degrees, 180 degrees and 270 degrees), with each being a 4x4 grid with certain filled squares
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vi Nguyen

      Rotate the piece counter-clockwise by 90 degrees

      Rotate the piece clockwise by 90 degrees

      • isFilled

        public boolean isFilled(int rot,
                        int row,
                        int col)
        Checks if there is a TetrisBlock at the (row, col) position for the rotation rot, where rot is 0, 90, 180 or 270 degrees
        Parameters:
        rot - rotation piece
        row - row of piece
        col - column of piece
        Returns:
        true if the square is filled and false otherwise
